bug.author: beizhengren
bug.summary: Install error: None of TensorFlow, PyTorch, or MXNet plugins were built. See errors above.
bug.description:
Environment:
Framework: (TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, MXNet) PyTorch Framework version:1.2.0 Horovod version:latest MPI version:4.0.0 CUDA version:10.0 NCCL version:no Python version:3.7.2 OS and version:ubuntu18.04 GCC version:7.4.0
Checklist:
Did you search issues to find if somebody asked this question before?yes If your question is about hang, did you read this doc? If your question is about docker, did you read this doc? Did you check if you question is answered in the troubleshooting guide? yes Your question: Please ask your question here.
I have 2 questions:
Does tensorflow must be installed?
I have installed PyTorch1.2.0, but when I run pip install horovod there is an error as following, what should I do? Thank you!
$ pip install horovod <denchmark-code>Looking in indexes: https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple/ Collecting horovod Using cached https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/packages/8f/d9/67e496de0e04d314bb4bf3621442880486a560ab4e682f1c24ec7bf3c9b6/horovod-0.17.0.post1.tar.gz Requirement already satisfied: cloudpickle in comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/beizhengren>@beizhengren</denchmark-link> , sorry about that, it's a bug. The fix is in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/horovod/horovod/pull/1336>#1336</denchmark-link> . Could you give it a try?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/alsrgv>@alsrgv</denchmark-link> Hi alsrgv, thank you very much! with your help, I did as following:
Installed nccl HOROVOD_GPU_ALLREDUCE=NCCL HOROVOD_NCCL_HOME=~/Workspace/git_project/nccl/build pip install --no-cache-dir git+https://github.com/horovod/horovod
And then, installed successfully!
